verses.verse: I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of the loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> With my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> I will make <S%H3045>known<s%> your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
I indeed <S%H559>declare,<s%> <S%H2617>"Love<s%> stands <S%H1129>firm<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> You <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%> Your faithfulness is in <S%H530>them.<s%>"
"I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with my <S%H972>chosen<s%> <S%H7650>one,<s%> I have sworn to <S%H1732>David,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%>

<S%H3559><s%> 'I will establish your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and build <S%H1129>up<s%> your <S%H3678>throne<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>'" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H6382>wonders,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> also in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the holy <S%H6918>ones.<s%>
For who in the <S%H7834>skies<s%> can be <S%H6186>compared<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> Who among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H410>heavenly<s%> beings is <S%H1819>like<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>
a <S%H7227>very<s%> <S%H6206>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H3372>ones,<s%> to be feared above all those who are around <S%H5439>him?<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> who is a <S%H2626>mighty<s%> <S%H3050>one,<s%> like you? Yah, your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> is around <S%H5439>you.<s%>
You <S%H4910>rule<s%> the <S%H1348>pride<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> When its <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H7721>rise<s%> <S%H7623>up,<s%> you calm them.

You have <S%H1792>broken<s%> <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> in <S%H1792>pieces,<s%> like one of the <S%H2491>slain.<s%> You have <S%H6340>scattered<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> with your <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H776>yours.<s%> The earth also is <S%H8398>yours;<s%> the world and its <S%H4393>fullness.<s%> You have founded <S%H3245>them.<s%>
The <S%H6828>north<s%> and the <S%H3225>south,<s%> you have <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H8396>them.<s%> Tabor and <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
You have a <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%> Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5810>strong,<s%> and your right <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>

<S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> and <S%H6664>justice<s%> are the <S%H4349>foundation<s%> of your <S%H3678>throne.<s%> Loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H6923>go<s%> before your <S%H6440>face.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3045>learn<s%> to <S%H8643>acclaim<s%> <S%H1980>you.<s%> They walk in the <S%H216>light<s%> of your <S%H6440>presence,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
In your <S%H8034>name<s%> they <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> all <S%H3117>day.<s%> In your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> they are <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
For you are the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of their <S%H5797>strength.<s%> In your <S%H7522>favor,<s%> our <S%H7161>horn<s%> will be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
For our <S%H4043>shield<s%> belongs to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> our <S%H4428>king<s%> to the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in <S%H2377>vision<s%> to your <S%H2623>saints,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7737>bestowed<s%> <S%H5828>strength<s%> on the <S%H1368>warrior.<s%> I have <S%H7311>exalted<s%> a young <S%H977>man<s%> from the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant.<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him with my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%>
with whom my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established.<s%> My <S%H2220>arm<s%> will also strengthen <S%H553>him.<s%>
No <S%H341>enemy<s%> will <S%H5378>tax<s%> <S%H5766>him.<s%> No wicked <S%H1121>man<s%> will oppress <S%H6031>him.<s%>
I will beat <S%H3807>down<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> before <S%H6440>him,<s%> and <S%H5062>strike<s%> those who hate <S%H8130>him.<s%>
But my <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and my loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> will be with <S%H8034>him.<s%> In my name, his <S%H7161>horn<s%> will be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
I will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> also on the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> on the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
He will <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H1>me,<s%> 'You are my Father, my <S%H410>God,<s%> and the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation!<s%>'
I will also <S%H5414>appoint<s%> him my <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> the <S%H5945>highest<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for him <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will stand firm with <S%H539>him.<s%>
I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> endure <S%H5703>forever,<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
If his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H8451>law,<s%> and <S%H3212>don't<s%> walk in my <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%>
if they <S%H2490>break<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>don't<s%> keep my <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>
then I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> their <S%H6588>sin<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H5061>stripes.<s%>
But I will not completely <S%H6331>take<s%> my loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> from <S%H530>him,<s%> nor allow my faithfulness to <S%H8266>fail.<s%>
I will not <S%H2490>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> nor <S%H8138>alter<s%> what my <S%H8193>lips<s%> have <S%H4161>uttered.<s%>
<S%H259>Once<s%> have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by my <S%H6944>holiness,<s%> I will not <S%H3576>lie<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>
His <S%H2233>seed<s%> will endure <S%H5769>forever,<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> like the sun before <S%H8121>me.<s%>
It will be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> like the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> in the <S%H7834>sky.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But you have <S%H2186>rejected<s%> and <S%H3988>spurned.<s%> You have been <S%H5674>angry<s%> with your <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
You have <S%H5010>renounced<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant.<s%> You have <S%H2490>defiled<s%> his <S%H5145>crown<s%> in the <S%H776>dust.<s%>
You have broken <S%H6555>down<s%> all his <S%H1448>hedges.<s%> You have <S%H7760>brought<s%> his <S%H4013>strongholds<s%> to <S%H4288>ruin.<s%>
All who pass <S%H5674>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8155>rob<s%> <S%H2781>him.<s%> He has become a reproach to his <S%H7934>neighbors.<s%>
You have <S%H7311>exalted<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of his <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%> You have made all of his <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>
<S%H7725>Yes,<s%> you turn back the <S%H6697>edge<s%> of his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H6965>haven't<s%> supported him in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
You have <S%H7673>ended<s%> his <S%H2892>splendor,<s%> and <S%H4048>thrown<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4048>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
You have <S%H7114>shortened<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth.<s%> You have <S%H5844>covered<s%> him with <S%H955>shame.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
How <S%H3068>long,<s%> Yahweh? Will you <S%H5641>hide<s%> yourself <S%H5331>forever?<s%> Will your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> like <S%H784>fire?<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> how <S%H2465>short<s%> my time <S%H7723>is!<s%> For what vanity have you created all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1121>men!<s%>

What <S%H1397>man<s%> is he who shall <S%H2421>live<s%> and not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4194>death,<s%> who shall <S%H4422>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol?<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> where are your <S%H7223>former<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindnesses,<s%> which you <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in your <S%H530>faithfulness?<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> how I <S%H5375>bear<s%> in my <S%H2436>heart<s%> the taunts of all the <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%>
With which your <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H2778>mocked,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with which they have <S%H2778>mocked<s%> the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of your anointed <S%H4899>one.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
